# Popup

NPopup

Popups are hidden elements that can be displayed conditionally as in a floating layer

Note that Popups can only be rendered client-side. You will need to wrap <n-popup> with a <ClientOnly> or other no-ssr wrapper provided by your SSR framework.

Props
8
Config
5
Slots
2
Events
2
Methods
0
Name
Type
Default
Description
v-model
Boolean
false

Popup visibility

trigger
Element
--

DOM element to attach this popup to

placement
String
auto

Dropdown placement, e.g. 'top', 'top-end' etc. See popper.js documentation.

arrow
Boolean
true

Show dropdown arrow

open-on-click
Boolean
true

Open when trigger slot is clicked

open-on-hover
Boolean
false

Open when mouse enters the trigger slot

type
String
--

Popup type, used as a class modifier

message
String
--

Popup content

Please note that arrow styles are not included, but you can add them for various placement positions: .n-popup[x-placement^="top"] .n-popup__arrow
